titleStmt.title: Robert C. Wright and John A. Tyrrell to James W. Tate
CWG7753

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
ROBERT C. WRIGHT,
Notary Public & Commissioner of Deeds.
FOR THE FOLLOWING STATES:
Wisconsin, Missouri, Kentucky, Ohio, Minnesota, Michigan, Connecticut, Iowa, New York, Indiana, N. Hampshire, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Kansas, Massachusetts, Nebraska, New Jersey, Vermont, Maine, Colorado.
WRIGHT & TYRRELL,
No. 5
METROPOLITAN BLOCK.
R. C. WRIGHT, JNO. A. TYRRELL.
Time Loans negotiated and First Class Business Paper bought and sold.
DEALERS IN REAL ESTATE.
P. O. Box, 6049.
Chicago, September 19 1862
Dear Sir

Your favour of 12' inst is at hand, herewith I hand you five dollars in note of the Farmers Bank of the city of Troy, this is for State Fee for commission as commissioner of deeds for State of Kentucky, please forward commission and oblige. With kind regards

James W. Tate Esq
Asst Secretary of State
Louisville Ky
